files.patch:
@@ -748,5 +748,5 @@
-#     These constraints cannot be mixed with other usage constraints for the
-#     same algorithm, they also cannot be linked with other constraints by an
-#     ampersand '&'. The usage type follows the keyword and more than one usage
-#     type can be specified with a whitespace delimiter.
-#     Example: "rsa_pkcs1_sha1 usage handshake"
+#     An algorithm with this constraint cannot include other usage types
+#     defined in the jdk.certpath.disabledAlgorithms property. The usage type
+#     follows the keyword and more than one usage type can be specified with a
+#     whitespace delimiter.
+#     Example: "rsa_pkcs1_sha1 usage Handshake"
